title: Kriegspiel: the War-Game. [A novel.]
author: Groome, Francis Hindes
snippet: " What, the fine handsome Perun and that old doctor—ay, I could hear it all plain enough where I was inthe Arthurstone.

title: Kriegspiel: the War-Game. [A novel.]
author: Groome, Francis Hindes
snippet: It was me what hooted " (with a whisperedlaugh); " I was there all the time in the Arthurstone."

title: Kriegspiel: the War-Game. [A novel.]
author: Groome, Francis Hindes
snippet: Anyhow, he is safe now till we get him toArthurstone; and I think you might relieve him of hisfotter."
